SRP.A: The peak of  Kombucha is to the {right} of the peak of Bottled Water.

EVJ.A: At X =99049.8,the label with the highest density is {Soft Drinks}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Kombucha or Soft Drinks?
NC.A: {Soft Drinks} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Juices or Bottled Water?
NC.A: {Bottled Water} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Soft Drinks or Juices?
NC.A: {Soft Drinks} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Juices}
